system_prompt.content: As a police AI, your role is to provide information regarding the crime scene. The crime scene involved a robbery at a convenience store reported at ~9pm Friday. Follow [System memory] instructions.

prompt_templates.base_prompt: [System memory] In 40-60 words, first assess whether the user's answer agrees with the accurate fact that
prompt_templates.improv_prompt: [System memory] In 40-60 words, first agree with the user's answer.

starters: consistent with what most people said
neg_starters: not in line with the evidence
not consistent with what most people said
not in sync with the evidence
not in line with the findings
not in line with the observations
not goes what was seen by other witnesses
reinforcers: only the top percentile of people observed this detail
difficult to catch but crucial detail
very few people got this detail

sentence_structures.construct: If the user's answer aligns with this fact, use {starters} while giving your feedback without revealing the fact.
If the user's answer contradicts this fact, use {neg_starters} while giving your feedback.

sentence_structures.sentence: Emphasize the importance of this detail in the investigation.
Generate a concise confirmation of what happened.

questions.prompt: Was it dark outside prior to the robbers entering the store?
Did the customer who was paying at the cashier's counter get down on the ground when threatened by the robber with the tattoo?
Was a female cashier assisting a customer at the counter during the robbery?
Did any of the robbers possess more than one firearm?
During the robbery, did any customers enter or leave the store?
Was there a security camera positioned in front of the store where the car dropped off the robbers?
Was there a CCTV screen located inside the store?
During the robbery, was there any visible damage to the store's items?
While the robbery was taking place, did the robber attempt to steal money from an ATM machine inside the store?
Did any of the customers in the store appear to be in panic during the robbery?
Did the female cashier flee to the back of the store during the robbery?
Did the cashier or any customers try to make a phone call during the robbery?
Was there an emergency telephone located inside the store?
Did the robber in the green hoodie carry a shotgun as their weapon?
Did the male customer resist when the robber brandished a knife?
Besides threatening the customers, did any of the robbers discharge their weapon?
Did the cashier hand over the money to the robber in a brown hoodie after being threatened with a gun?
Was there a security guard present during the robbery?
Did the robber in the gray hoodie attempt to lock the store door after entering?
While the robbery was in progress, did any new unsuspecting customers enter the store?
Did one of the robbers appear to be under 18 years old?
Did one of the robbers leap over the counter towards the area where the cashier was located?
After placing the cash from the cashier into a backpack, did the robber attempt to steal any other items?
Based on the robber's behavior, did they seem to have experience in robbing stores?
Were there any female customers present at the cash counter when the robbers entered?
Did you experience any technical issues during the questioning process?

conversation_flow.message: Hello, I am an AI police. My role is to evaluate a user's aptitude in demonstrating the qualities of a responsible citizen and reliable witness at a crime scene. I am here to ask you several questions and guide you through the process. Enter 'ok' to continue.
